name: frameworkthreejs

scripts.setup: npm run install_three && npm run setupDirectory && npm run addStyle && npm run move
scripts.setupDirectory: mkdir src\css src\js src\models src\textures framework\css framework\js framework\textures
scripts.addStyle: (echo body { & type tab.txt & echo background-color: white; & type tab.txt & echo margin : 0; & echo })> framework\css\style.css
scripts.move: move framework.js framework\js\framework.js && move CTABanner.js framework\js\CTABanner.js && move createScene.js framework\js\createScene.js && move table.js framework\js\table.js && move roof.jpg framework\textures\roof.jpg && move wall.jpg framework\textures\wall.jpg && move wood_floor.jpg framework\textures\wood_floor.jpg && move main.js src\js\main.js
scripts.initialState: move framework\js\framework.js framework.js && move framework\js\CTABanner.js CTABanner.js && move framework\js\createScene.js createScene.js && move framework\js\table.js table.js && move framework\textures\roof.jpg roof.jpg && move framework\textures\wall.jpg wall.jpg && move framework\textures\wood_floor.jpg wood_floor.jpg && move src\js\main.js main.js && npm run delete && npm run updateDoc
scripts.delete: rmdir /s /q src && rmdir /s /q node_modules && rmdir /s /q framework && del package-lock.json
scripts.moveDocumentation: move DOCUMENTATION.md framework\DOCUMENTATION.md && move .gitignore framework\.gitignore && move CHANGELOG.md framework\CHANGELOG.md && move README.md framework\README.md && move tab.txt framework\tab.txt && move package.json framework\package.json
scripts.deploy: npm run setupDirectory && npm run addStyle && npm run move && npm run moveDocumentation npm && run install_three

author: Kishan Turpin <kishan.turpin@gmail.com>, Dylan Malaussena
description: This is a Three.js framework for creating 3D web application for TerraNumerica.
